title: Antioxidant activity of an inclusion complex between rutin and β-cyclodextrin: experimental and quantum chemical studies
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,18330-18342
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02307B, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Thi Lan Pham, Thi Thu Ha Nguyen, Tuan Anh Nguyen, Irina Le-Deygen, Thi My Hanh Le, Xuan Minh Vu, Hai Khoa Le, Cuong Bui Van, T. R. Usacheva, Thanh Tung Mai, Dai Lam Tran
The antioxidant capacity of an inclusion complex between rutin and β-cyclodextrin has been evaluated and confirmed through theoretical calculations.
